Articles.Content:
Just figured out how to rename your own forum threads. I see people naming these threads, then other people telling them the name doesn't fit, and not being able to change it, so I'll tell you here.

You are able to rename threads in the forum on Windows by:

Hold Ctrl

Double click a thread's name (only if you made the thread)

Enter the new name

Press "Enter" or "Return" or whatever

Close the extra tabs that opened

Done. I feel like this isn't well-known enough.
I just click "go advanced" when editing and change it there. It's above the main text body.
Oh I didn't know you could do it that way thx
As this is about the forum rather than the game itself, the thread has been moved to Kerbal Network.
